snippet.title: Draw Rider Remake - Release Date Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Pre-order now: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/draw-rider-remake-switch/

Draw Rider Remake will be available on Nintendo Switch September 1st!🎉

Complete the campaign with a huge number of incredible levels. Also, you can always create your own level in the built-in editor, and play on tracks created by other players.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gamingstudio17
Twitter: https://twitter.com/17Studio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/17studio_official
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/17Studio

#DrawRider #NintendoSwitch #MadeWithUnity
